verses.verse: Forasmuch <S%G3767>then<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> hath <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3695>arm<s%> <S%G5210>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1771>mind:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he that hath <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> hath <S%G3973>ceased<s%> from <S%G266>sin;<s%>

That he no <S%G3371>longer<s%> should <S%G980>live<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1954>rest<s%> of his <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> to the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3928>past<s%> of our <S%G979>life<s%> may <S%G713>suffice<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> to have <S%G2716>wrought<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> when we <S%G4198>walked<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%> excess of <S%G3632>wine,<s%> <S%G2970>revellings,<s%> <S%G4224>banquetings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G111>abominable<s%> idolatries: <S%G1495><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they think it <S%G3579>strange<s%> that <S%G5216>ye<s%> run not <S%G4936>with<s%> <S%G3361><s%> them <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G401>excess<s%> of <S%G810>riot,<s%> speaking evil <S%G987>of<s%> you:
Who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> to him that <S%G2192>is<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>quick<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> was the gospel <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to them that are <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand:<s%> be ye therefore <S%G4993>sober,<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3525>watch<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4335>prayer.<s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> hath <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G5486>gift,<s%> even so <S%G1247>minister<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> one to <S%G1519>another,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G4164>manifold<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2980>speak,<s%> let him speak <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> if any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G1247>minister,<s%> let him do it <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2479>ability<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5524>giveth:<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>be<s%> <S%G1391>praise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2904>dominion<s%> forever and <S%G1519>ever.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> think it not <S%G3579>strange<s%> <S%G3361><s%> concerning <S%G3588>the<s%> fiery <S%G4451>trial<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> <S%G5213><s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> to <S%G4314>try<s%> <S%G3986><s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> though some strange <S%G3581>thing<s%> <S%G4819>happened<s%> unto you: <S%G5213><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> inasmuch <S%G2526>as<s%> ye are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings;<s%> <S%G2443>that,<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> shall be <S%G602>revealed,<s%> ye may be <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with exceeding <S%G21>joy.<s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> ye be <S%G3679>reproached<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3107>happy<s%> are ye; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G373>resteth<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you:<s%> on their <S%G2596>part<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3303>he<s%> is evil spoken <S%G987>of,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> on your <S%G2596>part<s%> <S%G5209><s%> he is <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>

But <S%G1063><s%> let <S%G5100>none<s%> <S%G3361><s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5406>murderer,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> as a <S%G2812>thief,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> as an <S%G2555>evildoer,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a busybody in other men's <S%G244>matters.<s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any man suffer <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5546>Christian,<s%> let him <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G153>ashamed;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> let him <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>behalf.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> is come that <S%G2917>judgment<s%> must <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G4412>first<s%> begin <S%G575>at<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> be of them that obey <S%G544>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G2532>let<s%> them that <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> commit the keeping <S%G3908>of<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> to him <S%G1722>in<s%> well <S%G16>doing,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2939>Creator.<s%>
